title: PM discusses political situation with MNAs, party leaders
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 4 (APP):Â Prime Minister Imran Khan on Friday, in a meeting with Members of National Assembly and the leaders of Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf discussed political situation in the country.
Those who attended the meeting included Special Assistant on Political Affairs and Chief Whip Malik Amir Dogar, MNA Muhammad Shafique Arain, Nawab Amanullah Khan, Dr Sher Muhammad Awan, Malik Asif Awan and Rana Shehzad Anwar.
Mian Saleem Raza, Malik Abdul Majeed Arain, Muhammad Nawaz. Muhammad Riaz, Iffat Tahira Soomro, Asiya Bibi, Muhammad Fayyaz Arain and Malik Faraz also attended the meeting.
The meeting also discussed the issues related to political constituencies.
In a separate meeting, MNAs Abdul Shakoor Shad, Makhdoom Syed Samiul Hassan Gilani, Prince Nawaz Alai, Abdul Ghaffar Wattoo, Makhdoom Basit Bukhari and Jaffar Khan Leghari, and MPA Malik Shahzad and Mena Leghari also discussed with the prime minister the matters related to their respective constituencies.
The parliamentarians including Shunila Ruth, Nusrat Wahid, Riaz Fatyana and Ghulam Bibi Bharwana also called on the prime minister discussed the affairs concerning their respective political constituencies.
